targets.query: SELECT mean("last1min") FROM "cpu.load" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT 100-mean("idle") FROM "cpu.usage" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND "id" = '-1' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") / mean("total")*100 FROM "memory" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used")/mean("total")*100 FROM "swap" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("rxbytes") * 0.8 FROM "net.dev" WHERE "name" =~ /$net$/ AND "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("txbytes")  / 10 FROM "net.dev" WHERE "name" =~ /$net$/ AND "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT mean("rxbytes") * 0.8 / mean("speed")*100 FROM "net.dev" WHERE "name" =~ /bond0/ AND "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND "tag_speed" = 'has_speed' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT mean("txbytes") * 0.8 / mean("speed")*100 FROM "net.dev" WHERE "name" =~ /bond0$/ AND "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND "tag_speed" = 'has_speed' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("rxbytes") * 0.8 / mean("speed") FROM "net.dev" WHERE "name" =~ /$net$/ AND "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND "tag_speed" = 'has_speed' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("io_ticks")  / 100 FROM "disk.io" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("all") FROM "tcp.stat" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND "type" = 'tcp' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") / mean("total")*100 FROM "disk.size" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") / mean("total")*100 FROM "disk.inode" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path" fill(null)

list.label: host
list.name: machine
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu.load" WITH KEY = "host" where "host" !~ /^1|^,/
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu.usage" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "host" =~ /$tag/
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "host.group" WITH KEY = "group"

list.label: net
list.name: net
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net.dev" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu.usage" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "host" =~ /$tag/
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "host.group" WITH KEY = "group"
